subject: Baseball
Football
Super Bowl
World Series
lead_paragraph: The first Super Bowl was played Jan. 15, 1967. Since then, there have been four instances in which a city has celebrated a World Series championship, then followed that with a Super Bowl trophy. So can Philadelphia, a city more accustomed to heartbreak than parades, become the fifth?.
